ygData.subject: RE: [eqbards] "Useless" songs
ygData.msgSnippet: you forgot some: Level 14 - Lyssa s Cataloging Libretto, unless you are doing the lambent quests and need a rune identified. Level 21 - Melanie s Mellifluous
ygData.messageBody:
you forgot some:

Level 14 - Lyssa's Cataloging Libretto, unless you are doing the lambent
quests and need a rune identified.

Level 21 - Melanie's Mellifluous Motion, unless you are PvP i guess.

Level 57 - Cassindra's Insipid Ditty, same boat as Denon's Dissension

Level 59 - Solon's Charismatic Concord, this is what i am working for?

> 53 - Song of Dawn: Reducing aggro on secondary MOBs doesn't help when
> you're the only one on the list.

Well, i am no expert on how aggro works, but when i have a secondary mob on
me that i believe no one else has aggro'd, Song of Dawn has worked to get it
off me and on someone else. maybe someone else did have aggro and i was not
aware, but not that i could tell.

Shada
